string-array.name: eminem_quotes
string-array.item: Trying to buy me some time then I remembered this magic trick\nDun da dun da dun duun Go-Go Gadget Dick!
Wait what if there is an explanation for this shit?\nWhat she tripped, fell, landed on his dick?
Dicks too short of a word for my dick, get of my antidisestablishmentarianism you prick
Where the fuck is Kanye when you need him?
I want you to feel me like my stepfather felt me.
Killing pedestrians, raping lesbians, while they are screaming: LETS JUST BE FRIENDS
Chubba chubba chubba chubba chubba chubbie I don\'t have any lines to go right here so, chubba teletubbie!
Somewhere deep down there\'s a decent man in me, he just can\'t be found.
Love is evil, spell it backwards, I’ll show ya.
I\'d rather have a babie through my penis than be married again.
I\'m over here Sue, you\'re talkin to the plant, look!
And Dr. Dre said, Nothing you idiots, Dr. Dre IS DEAD!
I think Kim Kardashian\'s a man
My earliest memory was raping the babysitter when I was 5… She was 15.
You call me the champ, call me the space shuttle destroyer.\nI just blew up the challenger, matter fact I need a lawyer
